snippet: Winnipeg finally got an N.H.L. team back and now is looking to host a Heritage Classic outdoors.
abstract: Winnipeg finally got an N.H.L. team back and now is looking to host a Heritage Classic outdoors.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. is looking into staging another edition of the Heritage Classic, an outdoor game between Canadian teams, at the under-construction Investors Field at the University of Manitoba in 2014, according to The Winnipeg Free Press.

headline.main: N.H.L. Eyes Winnipeg for Heritage Classic
